name: Malfunction (itch) (Niko Kallio)
description:
A top down Shoot' em up game done for Finnish College Gamejam 2021, where you try to survive for as long as possible and try to get a high score by killing enemies. Every few seconds the Player loses or gains a "Mechanic" like movement, and has to find out different ways to play in the enemy onslaught.

In collaboration with:

https://garbuend.itch.io/

https://bugtreefrog.itch.io/

https://cge-mannerheim.itch.io/

https://nico-heinaaho.itch.io/

Jere P.

Assets used:

A* Pathfinding Project Free Version https://arongranberg.com/astar/
